title: Maduro Capture Puts Spotlight on Maha’s Venezuela Oil Project
description: Maha Capital, a Swedish energy company with rights to a languishing oil project in Venezuela, is considering partnerships after Nicolas Maduro’s capture could open the industry to foreign investment.
content: Maha Capital, a Swedish energy company with rights to a languishing oil project in Venezuela, is considering partnerships after Nicolas Maduro’s capture could open the industry to foreign investment.
